title: Radgepacket - Volume Two
description: Radgepacket Two takes over from where it's predecessor left off. We've got a tart with a heart in a satellite town, a chav girl up a mountain, an ageing rock star pretending to be gay and a hard case in a soft shirt celebrating his birthday, amongst others. These tales from the Inner Cities and many more are told in our usual style - brutal, uncompromising and explicit. If you like your fiction with happy endings, little kittens playing with string and no swearing then you won't like this! On the other hand, if you're brave enough to pick this up then you might just find it hard to put down......
author: Danny King
